channel.title: Tor Browser 6.0.3 says "Your firefox is out of date"
channel.description:
There is bar on top saying that with button "Get firefox" this happened since I upgraded to latest stable version 6.0.3
It stays on all the time.

item.title: Tor Browser 6.0.3 says "Your firefox is out of date"

item.description:
Mostly I wanted to see if other whonix users have the same issue

item.title: Tor Browser 6.0.3 says "Your firefox is out of date"

item.description:
